description: A Flutter widget representing the Feedback Center screen for managers, including access control based on roles, header styling, and placeholder list items.

classes.name: ManagerFeedbackCenterScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget for the manager's feedback center screen, managing role-based access and displaying placeholders.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A private stateless widget representing individual feedback list items with icons and styled containers.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the feedback center screen, including role check, app bar, and list of placeholder items.

methods.name: _Item.build
methods.description: Builds the UI for each feedback list item, with icon and text inside a decorated container.
